            int resourceCost,
            Element[] elementCost,
            Player owner)
        Instantiates a new card.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card
        name - the name of the card
        resourceCost - the cost in resources to play the card
        elementCost - the cost in elements to play the card
        owner - the owner of the card

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public abstract boolean play(Side mySide,
                             Side opponentsSide)
        This function is called by the game when the card is played. Always make sure the card is ready in play.
        Parameters:
        mySide - theSide this card belongs to
        opponentsSide - the opponent to the side this card belongs to
        Returns:
        whether the card was played
